sql-script.name: script
sql-script.tran-sql: create table sf_log_entity_update ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar(32) not null, opid int not null, valname varchar(32) not null, fromval varchar(128), toval varchar(128), userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_entity_insert ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_entity_delete ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32), tblname varchar(32) not null, userid char(32) not null, usertext varchar(32) not null, createdate datetime not null, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_download ( id char(32) not null, beanid char(32) not null, filesize bigint not null, filetype varchar(16), userid char(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, ip varchar(32) not null, lastupdate datetime, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_login ( id char(32) not null, userid char(32), usertext varchar(32), createdate datetime not null, logoutdate datetime, ip varchar(32) not null, description varchar(256), primary key(id) );

create table sf_log_pv_stat ( id char(32) not null, lyear smallint not null, lmonth tinyint not null, lday tinyint not null, lhour tinyint not null, pv int not null, uv int not null, ip int not null, averagetime int not null, mintime int not null, maxtime int not null, primary key(id) );
